mapper.select: SELECT count( ra.`status` IN ( '0', '1', '2' ) OR NULL ) AS 'notFinishNum', count( ra.STATUS = '3' OR NULL ) AS 'finishNum' FROM sys_repair_serviceman rs LEFT JOIN sys_repair_application ra ON rs.repair_id = ra.id

SELECT s.nick FROM ( SELECT ra.provider_id, u.nick_name AS 'nick', count( l.type = '1' OR NULL ) AS 'c' FROM sys_repair_application ra LEFT JOIN sys_like_or_not l ON ra.id = l.repair_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = ra.provider_id GROUP BY ra.provider_id, u.nick_name ORDER BY c DESC ) s where s.provider_id is not null LIMIT 1

SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u,( SELECT rs.serviceman_id AS 'id', count( l.type = '1' OR NULL ) AS 'c' FROM sys_repair_application ra LEFT JOIN sys_like_or_not l ON ra.id = l.repair_id LEFT JOIN sys_repair_serviceman rs ON rs.repair_id = ra.id GROUP BY rs.serviceman_id ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 1 ) s WHERE s.id = u.user_id

SELECT ra.id, rs.id as 'repairServicemanId', ra.fault_details, ra.fault_location, ra.picture, ra.emergency_degree, ra.`status` AS 'repairStatus', ra.found_time, ra.start_time, ra.finish_time, rs.STATUS AS 'acceptStatus' FROM sys_repair_application ra LEFT JOIN sys_repair_serviceman rs ON ra.id = rs.repair_id WHERE ( ra.STATUS = '1' OR ra.STATUS = '2' ) AND rs.serviceman_id = #{userId} AND (rs.STATUS = '0' OR rs.STATUS = '1')
SELECT u.user_id, u.nick_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_users_roles ur ON ur.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE r.NAME = #{role}
